definition: thin piece/flake/a slice/film/TV play/to slice/to carve thin/partial/incomplete/one-sided/classifier for slices, tablets, tract of land, area of water/classifier for CDs, movies, DVDs etc/used with numeral 一[yi1]: classifier for scenario, scene, feeling, atmosphere, sound etc/Kangxi radical 91
katsuobushi or dried bonito flakes (paper-thin shavings of preserved skipjack tuna)

sentences.english: Culinarily , sashimi represents the Japanese cultural appreciation of subtlety.
sentences.chinese: 从烹饪上说，生鱼片代表了日本的精明文化价值观。

sentences.english: So there I was happily pan frying the slabs when I lost my grip on one as I was turning it.
sentences.chinese: 我高兴地用煎锅煎鱼片，在翻转鱼片时我失手了。

sentences.english: So there I was happily pan frying the slabs when I lost my grip on one as I was turning it.
sentences.chinese: 我高兴地用煎锅煎鱼片，在翻转鱼片时我失手了。

sentences.english: Offer all kinds of specific roasted eel prawn and fillet.
sentences.chinese: 供应各种规格的高品质烤鳗鱼，对虾，鱼片。

sentences.english: Alaska Pollock fillets IQF, interleaved, Block.
sentences.chinese: 阿拉斯加狭鳕鱼片，单冻，分层，块冻。

sentences.english: The chicken roulade and roasted fillet of sole were dull to this tongue;
sentences.chinese: 鸡肉卷和烤鳎鱼鱼片又是那么绵软可口。

sentences.english: Pour the mixture into a dish, add fillet. Steam for 15 minutes over boiling water.
sentences.chinese: 鲩鱼片放入有蛋的碟中，隔热水蒸15分钟。

sentences.english: The crabmeat and sashimi are so fresh and juicy that you'd no doubt want to order more.
sentences.chinese: 螃蟹肉和生鱼片新鲜且多汁，你当然希望多多益善了。

sentences.english: The plate contained both fishflakes and prawns, with the latter being the much preferred cuisine.
sentences.chinese: 盘子里装着鱼片和大虾，大虾是清洁鱼更喜欢的美食。

sentences.english: If it comes in filleted, well, when was it filleted?
sentences.chinese: 如果是鱼片，我们就要知道，它们是什么时候切片？

sentences.english: Small rice balls with fish, shellfish, etc. on top.
sentences.chinese: 握寿司顶部盖有生鱼片的小饭团。

sentences.english: I like to have sashimi and sushi with wasabi. That makes the taste delicious.
sentences.chinese: 我喜欢吃芥末的生鱼片和寿司，那使口味美味。

sentences.english: Sauté fillets until golden and cooked through, about 5 minutes per side.
sentences.chinese: 放入鱼片，两面各煎约5分钟，直到鱼片呈金黄色。

sentences.english: Sauté fillets until golden and cooked through, about 5 minutes per side.
sentences.chinese: 放入鱼片，两面各煎约5分钟，直到鱼片呈金黄色。

sentences.english: Set a steamer basket in the skillet, and arrange fillets in basket.
sentences.chinese: 将鱼片摆放于一个蒸笼里上锅蒸。

sentences.english: Add fillets to pan and cook about 4 minutes until bottom side is seared.
sentences.chinese: 把鱼片放的锅上煎大约4分钟，直到底部焦黄。

definition: fish head/fig. upright and unwilling to compromise
quick-boil/to boil for a short time
